snippet: The Tigers clinched at least a tie for first place in the A.L. Central with a win over the Twins that helped stretch Detroit’s lead over the White Sox to three games.
abstract: MLB Roundup; Detroit Tigers defeat Minnesota Twins, 2-1, to clinch at least a tie for first place in the American League Central; other baseball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: The Tigers clinched at least a tie for first place in the A.L. Central with a win over the Twins that helped stretch Detroit’s lead over the White Sox to three games.

headline.seo: Tigers Beat Twins and Increase Lead Over White Sox
headline.main: Fielder’s Home Run Assures Tigers of Share of First
headline.print_headline: Fielder Ensures Tigers a Share of First
